name: Car simulator
description:
This is an open-world car simulator. I started this project 2017-12-09. It has ultra-graphics and is quite realistic.

Controls:

W = Forward

S =Backward

A = Left

D = Right

Shift = Boost (Not avalible in 1.0.4)

Esc = Back to the main menu

Log:
